description: Complete settings export including all sections

myInfo.name: John Smith
myInfo.profile: Experienced developer with expertise in web technologies

prompt.customPrompt: You are a professional business communication assistant. Help facilitate clear and effective communication between international business partners.
prompt.responseExamples:
Thank you for your input.
I understand your perspective.
Let me clarify that point.
What are your thoughts on this?
prompt.conversationGoals: Facilitate clear communication, build rapport, ensure mutual understanding, and maintain professional relationships.
prompt.avoidTopics: Personal politics, controversial topics, sensitive personal information, religious discussions

conversationHistory.question: What are the main features of our new product?
conversationHistory.response: Our new product includes advanced analytics, real-time collaboration, and seamless integration with existing systems.

conversationHistory.question: How was your weekend?
conversationHistory.response: It was great! I spent time with family and did some hiking. How about you?
